text: The Syrians imagined that when man and woman were created in the fourth heaven, they dared to eat a cake, instead of ambrosia, which was their natural food. The ambrosia was exhaling through the pores; but after eating the cake, you had to go to the apothecary. The man and the woman begged an angel to show them where the toilet was. See, the angel said to them, that little planet, barely visible, which is about sixty million miles from here; there is the exalted of the universe; go as fast as possible. And they went there and stayed; and from that moment on our world was what it is. The following is a list of the most commonly used words in the English language:
title: Todo está bien
